title: Social4Rec: Distilling User Preference from Social Graph for Video Recommendation in Tencent. (arXiv:2302.09971v3 [cs.IR] UPDATED)
abstract: Despite recommender systems play a key role in network content platforms, mining the user's interests is still a significant challenge. Existing works predict the user interest by utilizing user behaviors, i.e., clicks, views, etc., but current solutions are ineffective when users perform unsettled activities. The latter ones involve new users, which have few activities of any kind, and sparse users who have low-frequency behaviors. We uniformly describe both these user-types as "cold users", which are very common but often neglected in network content platforms. translated_title: Social4Rec: 从社交网络中提取用户偏好进行腾讯视频推荐
translated_abstract: 尽管推荐系统在网络内容平台中起着关键作用，但挖掘用户的兴趣仍然是一个重大挑战。现有方法通过利用用户的行为（点击、查看等）来预测用户的兴趣，但当用户进行不稳定的活动时，当前的解决方案效果不佳。这些情况包括新用户和行为频率较低的稀疏用户。我们统一将这两种用户类型称为“冷用户”，这在网络内容平台中非常常见，但经常被忽视。为了解决这个问题，我们通过将用户的社交兴趣（如友谊、关注博主、兴趣组等）与活动行为相结合，增强用户兴趣的表示。因此，在这项工作中，我们提出了一种名为SocialNet的新算法，采用两阶段方法逐步提取粗粒度和细粒度的社交兴趣。我们的技术随后将SocialNet的输出与推荐系统的传统方法相结合，实现了更好的视频推荐效果。
tldr: 本文提出了Social4Rec算法，采用两阶段方法从社交网络中提取用户兴趣，解决网络内容平台中冷用户的推荐问题。
en_tdlr: This paper presents the Social4Rec algorithm, which adopts a two-stage method to extract user interests from social networks and addresses the recommendation issue of "cold users" in network content platforms.
